name: Create Microsoft To-Do Tasks from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new task in Microsoft To-Do. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1u4TfOMUPF3T6HGpLylYZkw9mWqKP1hbiy0yPqsx23k0/edit?ts=5e4e06c0#gid=0).
